principal) {\\n484|        point.setUpdatedBy(principal.getName());\\n485|        RestaurantPoint updated = pointService.updatePoint(pointId, point);\\n486|        return ResponseEntity.ok(updated);\\n487|    }\\n488|}\\n489|```\\n490|\\n491|#### 6.1.2     (Service)\\n492|```java\\n493|@Service\\n494|transactional\\n495|public class RestaurantPointService {\\n496|    \\n497|    @Autowired\\n498|    private RestaurantPointRepository pointRepository;\\n499|    \\n500|    @Autowired\\n501|    private DataValidator dataValidator;\\n502|    \\n503|    @Autowired\\n504|    private OperationLogService logService;\\n505|    \\n506|    /**\\n507|     *         -             \\n508|     */\\n509|    public RestaurantPoint updatePoint(String pointId, RestaurantPoint newData) {\\n510|        // 1.       \\n511|        ValidationResult validation = dataValidator.validate(newData);\\n512|        if (!validation.isValid()) {\\n513|            throw new ValidationException("      ", validation.getErrors());\\n514|        }\\n515|        \\n516|        // 2.      \\n517|        RestaurantPoint existingPoint = pointRepository.findById(pointId)\\n518|            .orElseThrow(() -> new NotFoundException("      "));\\n519|        \\n520|        // 3.       \\n521|        logService.logUpdateOperation(existingPoint, newData);\\n522|        \\n523|        // 4.     \\n524|        existingPoint.setRestaurantName(newData.getRestaurantName());\\n525|        existingPoint.setAddress(newData.getAddress());\\n526|        existingPoint.setBusinessHours(newData.getBusinessHours());\\n527|        existingPoint.setContactPerson(newData.getContactPerson());\\n528|        existingPoint.setPhoneNumber(newData.getPhoneNumber());\\n529|        existingPoint.setStatus(newData.getStatus());\\n530|        existingPoint.setUpdatedBy(newData.getUpdatedBy());\\n531|        existingPoint.setLastUpdated(new Date());\\n532|        \\n533|        // 5.     \\n534|        return pointRepository.save(existingPoint);\\n535|    }\\n536|}\\n537|```\\n538|\\n539|### 6.2     \\n540|\\n541|#### 6.2.1       \\n542|```java\\n543|/**\\n544| *       -         \\n545| */\\n546|@Component\\n547|public class DataValidator {\\n548|    \\n549|    private static final Pattern Pattern.compile("^([0-1][0-9]|2[0-3]):[0-5][0-9]-([0-1][0-9]|2[0-3]):[0-5][0-9]$");\\n553|    \\n554|    /**\\n555|     *            \\n556|     */\\n557|    public ValidationResult result) {\\n581|        if (!PHONE_PATTERN.matcher(phone).matches()) {\\n582|            result.addError("phoneNumber", "         ");\\n583|        }\\n584|    }\\n585|}\\n586|```\\n587|\\n588|## 7.    \n\n## 3.        \n\n### 3.1       \n\n```mermaid\nclassDiagram\n    class User {\n        +String userId\n        +String username\n        +String password\n        +String email\n        +String role\n        +Date createdAt\n        +Date lastLoginAt\n        +boolean isActive\n        +authenticate(password: String) boolean\n        +hasRole(role: String) boolean\n    }\n    \n    class RestaurantPoint {\n        +String pointId\n        +String restaurantName\n        +String address\n        +String businessHours\n        +String contactPerson\n        +String phoneNumber\n        +PointStatus status\n        +Date lastUpdated\n        +String updatedBy\n        +int version\n        +validate() ValidationResult\n        +getFormattedBusinessHours() String\n    }\n    \n    class RefreshmentData {\n        +String refreshmentId\n        +String pointId\n        +String dataType\n        +Object dataValue\n        +Date timestamp\n        +boolean validated\n        +String validationNotes\n        +isValidated() boolean\n        +setValidationStatus(validated: boolean, notes: String)\n    }\n    \n    class OperationLog {\n        +Long logId\n        +String operationType\n        +String pointId\n        +String operatorId\n        +Date operationTime\n        +String oldData\n        +String newData\n        +String status\n        +String errorMessage\n        +logOperation(operationType: String, pointId: String, operatorId: String)\n        +setResult(status: String, errorMessage: String)\n    }\n    \n    class ValidationResult {\n        +boolean isValid\n        +List~ValidationError~ errors\n        +Date validationTime\n        +String validatorName\n        +addError(field: String, message: String)\n        +hasErrors() boolean\n        +getErrorMessages() List~String~\n    }\n    \n    class ValidationError {\n        +String field\n        +String message\n        +String errorCode\n        +Object rejectedValue\n        +getFormattedMessage() String\n    }\n    \n    class PointStatus {\n        <<enumeration>>\n        ACTIVE\n        MAINTENANCE\n        CLOSED\n    }\n    \n    class OperationType {\n        <<enumeration>>\n        CREATE\n        UPDATE\n        DELETE\n        VALIDATE\n        CANCEL\n    }\n    \n    %%     \n    User \"1\" --> \"*\" OperationLog :   \n    RestaurantPoint \"1\" --> \"*\" RefreshmentData :   \n    RestaurantPoint \"1\" --> \"*\" OperationLog :   \n    ValidationResult \"1\" --> \"*\" ValidationError :   \n    RestaurantPoint ..> ValidationResult :   \n    RestaurantPoint ..> PointStatus :   \n    OperationLog ..> OperationType :   \n```\n\n### 3.2     \n\n```mermaid\nclassDiagram\n    class RestaurantPointService {\n        <<interface>>\n        +getPointById(pointId: String) RestaurantPointDTO\n        +searchPoints(criteria: SearchCriteria) Page~RestaurantPointDTO~\n        +createPoint(point: CreatePointRequest) RestaurantPointDTO\n        +updatePoint(pointId: String, updateData: UpdatePointRequest) RestaurantPointDTO\n        +deletePoint(pointId: String) boolean\n        +validatePoint(pointId: String) ValidationResultDTO\n        +confirmUpdate(pointId: String, confirmation: ConfirmationRequest) boolean\n        +cancelOperation(pointId: String) boolean\n    }\n    \n    class ValidationService {\n        <<interface>>\n        +validateRestaurantPoint(point: RestaurantPointDTO) ValidationResultDTO\n        +validateBusinessHours(hours: String) boolean\n        +validatePhoneNumber(phone: String) boolean\n        +validateAddress(address: String) boolean\n        +validateRequiredFields(data: Map~String, Object~) List~String~\n    }\n    \n    class AuthService {\n        <<interface>>\n        +authenticate(username: String, password: String) AuthResponse\n        +refreshToken(refreshToken: String) AuthResponse\n        +logout(token: String) boolean\n        +validateToken(token: String) UserDetails\n        +getCurrentUser() UserDTO\n    }\n    \n    class OperationLogService {\n        <<interface>>\n        +logOperation(operation: OperationLogDTO) OperationLogDTO\n        +getLogsByPointId(pointId: String) List~OperationLogDTO~\n        +getLogsByOperatorId(operatorId: String) List~OperationLogDTO~\n        +searchLogs(criteria: LogSearchCriteria) Page~OperationLogDTO~\n        +exportLogs(criteria: ExportCriteria) byte[]\n    }\n    \n    class ETOURIntegrationService {\n        <<interface>>\n        +syncPointData(pointId: String) boolean\n        +checkConnection() boolean\n        +handleConnectionError(error: Exception) boolean\n        +getPointFromETOUR(pointId: String) ETOURPointDTO\n        +updatePointInETOUR(pointId: String, data: Map~String, Object~) boolean\n    }\n    \n    %%     \n    class RestaurantPointServiceImpl {\n        +getPointById(pointId: String) RestaurantPointDTO\n        +updatePoint(pointId: String, updateData: UpdatePointRequest) RestaurantPointDTO\n        -validateUpdateRequest(request: UpdatePointRequest) ValidationResultDTO\n        -checkConcurrentUpdate(pointId: String, version: int) boolean\n        -saveWithRetry(point: RestaurantPoint, maxRetries: int) RestaurantPoint\n    }\n    \n    class ValidationServiceImpl {\n        +validateRestaurantPoint(point: RestaurantPointDTO) ValidationResultDTO\n        -validateFieldLengths(point: RestaurantPointDTO) List~ValidationError~\n        -validateBusinessRules(point: RestaurantPointDTO) List~ValidationError~\n        -validateDataConsistency(point: RestaurantPointDTO) List~ValidationError~\n    }\n    \n    RestaurantPointServiceImpl ..|> RestaurantPointService :   \n    ValidationServiceImpl ..|> ValidationService :   \n```\n\n## 4.       \n\n### 4.1        \n\n```mermaid\nsequenceDiagram\n    participant Operator as       \n    participant UI as     \n    participant AuthController as      \n (Controller)\\n446|```java\\n447|@RestController\\n448|@RequestMapping("/api/restaurant-points")\\n449|public class RestaurantPointController {\\n450|    \\n451|    @Autowired\\n452|    private RestaurantPointService pointService;\\n453|    \\n454|    /**\\n455|     *        \\n456|     */\\n457|    @GetMapping("/{pointId}")\\n458|    public ResponseEntity<RestaurantPoint> getRestaurantPoint(\\n459|            @PathVariable String pointId) {\\n460|        RestaurantPoint point = pointService.getPointById(pointId);\\n461|        return ResponseEntity.ok(point);\\n462|    }\\n463|    \\n464|    /**\\n465|     *        \\n466|     */\\n467|    @PostMapping\\n468|    public ResponseEntity<RestaurantPoint> createRestaurantPoint(\\n469|            @Valid @RequestBody RestaurantPoint point,\\n470|            Principal principal) {\\n471|        point.setCreatedBy(principal.getName());\\n472|        RestaurantPoint created = pointService.createPoint(point);\\n473|        return ResponseEntity.status(HttpStatus.CREATED).body(created);\\n474|    }\\n475|    \\n476|    /**\\n477|     *        \\n478|     */\\n479|    @PutMapping("/{pointId}")\\n480|    public ResponseEntity<RestaurantPoint> updateRestaurantPoint(\\n481|            @PathVariable String pointId,\\n482|            @Valid @RequestBody RestaurantPoint point,\\n483|            Principal principal) {\\n484|        point.setUpdatedBy(principal.getName());\\n485|        RestaurantPoint updated = pointService.updatePoint(pointId, point);\\n486|        return ResponseEntity.ok(updated);\\n487|    }\\n488|}\\n489|```\\n490|\\n491|#### 6.1.2     (Service)\\n492|```java\\n493|@Service\\n494|transactional\\n495|public class RestaurantPointService {\\n496|    \\n497|    @Autowired\\n498|    private RestaurantPointRepository pointRepository;\\n499|    \\n500|    @Autowired\\n501|    private DataValidator dataValidator;\\n502|    \\n503|    @Autowired\\n504|    private OperationLogService logService;\\n505|    \\n506|    /**\\n507|     *         -             \\n508|     */\\n509|    public RestaurantPoint updatePoint(String pointId, RestaurantPoint newData) {\\n510|        // 1.       \\n511|        ValidationResult validation = dataValidator.validate(newData);\\n512|        if (!validation.isValid()) {\\n513|            throw new ValidationException("      ", validation.getErrors());\\n514|        }\\n515|        \\n516|        // 2.      \\n517|        RestaurantPoint existingPoint = pointRepository.findById(pointId)\\n518|            .orElseThrow(() -> new NotFoundException("      "));\\n519|        \\n520|        // 3.       \\n521|        logService.logUpdateOperation(existingPoint, newData);\\n522|        \\n523|        // 4.     \\n524|        existingPoint.setRestaurantName(newData.getRestaurantName());\\n525|        existingPoint.setAddress(newData.getAddress());\\n526|        existingPoint.setBusinessHours(newData.getBusinessHours());\\n527|        existingPoint.setContactPerson(newData.getContactPerson());\\n528|        existingPoint.setPhoneNumber(newData.getPhoneNumber());\\n529|        existingPoint.setStatus(newData.getStatus());\\n530|        existingPoint.setUpdatedBy(newData.getUpdatedBy());\\n531|        existingPoint.setLastUpdated(new Date());\\n532|        \\n533|        // 5.     \\n534|        return pointRepository.save(existingPoint);\\n535|    }\\n536|}\\n537|```\\n538|\\n539|### 6.2     \\n540|\\n541|#### 6.2.1       \\n542|```java\\n543|/**\\n544| *       -         \\n545| */\\n546|@Component\\n547|public class DataValidator {\\n548|    \\n549|    private static final Pattern PHONE_PATTERN = \\n550|        Pattern.compile("^[+]?[0-9]{10,15}$");\\n551|    private static final Pattern BUSINESS_HOURS_PATTERN = \\n552|        Pattern.compile("^([0-1][0-9]|2[0-3]):[0-5][0-9]-([0-1][0-9]|2[0-3]):[0-5][0-9]$");\\n553|    \\n554|    /**\\n555|     *            \\n556|     */\\n557|    public ValidationResult validate(RestaurantPoint point) {\\n558|        ValidationResult result = new ValidationResult();\\n559|        \\n560|        //       \\n561|        validateRequiredField(point.getRestaurantName(), "    ", result);\\n562|        validateRequiredField(point.getAddress(), "  ", result);\\n563|        \\n564|        //         \\n565|        if (point.getPhoneNumber() != null && !point.getPhoneNumber().isEmpty()) {\\n566|            validatePhoneNumber(point.getPhoneNumber(), result);\\n567|        }\\n568|        \\n569|        //         \\n570|        if (point.getBusinessHours() != null && !point.getBusinessHours().isEmpty()) {\\n571|            validateBusinessHours(point.getBusinessHours(), result);\\n572|        }\\n573|        \\n574|        //       \\n575|        validateBusinessRules(point, result);\\n576|        \\n577|        return result;\\n578|    }\\n579|    \\n580|    private void validatePhoneNumber(String phone, ValidationResult result) {\\n581|        if (!PHONE_PATTERN.matcher(phone).matches()) {\\n582|            result.addError("phoneNumber", "         ");\\n583|        }\\n584|    }\\n585|}\\n586|```\\n587|\\n588|## 7. REFERENCES restaurant_points(point_id),\\n323|    data_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,\\n324|    data_value TEXT,\\n325|    timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,\\n326|    validated BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,\\n327|    INDEX idx_point_id (point_id)\\n328|);\\n329|```\\n330|\\n331|**operation_logs  **\\n332|```sql\\n333|CREATE TABLE operation_logs (\\n334|    log_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY (Controller)\\n446|```java\\n447|@RestController\\n448|@RequestMapping("/api/restaurant-points")\\n449|public class RestaurantPointController {\\n450|    \\n451|    @Autowired\\n452|    private RestaurantPointService pointService;\\n453|    \\n454|    /**\\n455|     *        \\n456|     */\\n457|    @GetMapping("/{pointId}")\\n458|    public ResponseEntity<RestaurantPoint> getRestaurantPoint(\\n459|            @PathVariable String pointId) {\\n460|        RestaurantPoint point = pointService.getPointById(pointId);\\n461|        return ResponseEntity.ok(point);\\n462|    }\\n463|    \\n464|    /**\\n465|     *        \\n466|     */\\n467|    @PostMapping\\n468|    public ResponseEntity<RestaurantPoint> createRestaurantPoint(\\n469|            @Valid @RequestBody RestaurantPoint point,\\n470|            Principal principal) {\\n471|        point.setCreatedBy(principal.getName());\\n472|        RestaurantPoint created = pointService.createPoint(point);\\n473|        return ResponseEntity.status(HttpStatus.CREATED).body(created);\\n474|    }\\n475|    \\n476|    /**\\n477|     *        \\n478|     */\\n479|    @PutMapping("/{pointId}")\\n480|    public ResponseEntity<RestaurantPoint> updateRestaurantPoint(\\n481|            @PathVariable String pointId,\\n482|            @Valid @RequestBody RestaurantPoint point,\\n483|            Principal principal) {\\n484|        point.setUpdatedBy(principal.getName());\\n485|        RestaurantPoint updated = pointService.updatePoint(pointId, point);\\n486|        return ResponseEntity.ok(updated);\\n487|    }\\n488|}\\n489|```\\n490|\\n491|#### 6.1.2     (Service)\\n492|```java\\n493|@Service\\n494|transactional\\n495|public class RestaurantPointService {\\n496|    \\n497|    @Autowired\\n498|    private RestaurantPointRepository pointRepository;\\n499|    \\n500|    @Autowired\\n501|    private DataValidator dataValidator;\\n502|    \\n503|    @Autowired\\n504|    private OperationLogService logService;\\n505|    \\n506|    /**\\n507|     *         -             \\n508|     */\\n509|    public RestaurantPoint updatePoint(String pointId, RestaurantPoint newData) {\\n510|        // 1.       \\n511|        ValidationResult validation = dataValidator.validate(newData);\\n512|        if (!validation.isValid()) {\\n513|            throw new ValidationException("      ", validation.getErrors());\\n514|        }\\n515|        \\n516|        // 2.      \\n517|        RestaurantPoint existingPoint = pointRepository.findById(pointId)\\n518|            .orElseThrow(() -> new NotFoundException("      "));\\n519|        \\n520|        // 3.       \\n521|        logService.logUpdateOperation(existingPoint, newData);\\n522|        \\n523|        // 4.     \\n524|        existingPoint.setRestaurantName(newData.getRestaurantName());\\n525|        existingPoint.setAddress(newData.getAddress());\\n526|        existingPoint.setBusinessHours(newData.getBusinessHours());\\n527|        existingPoint.setContactPerson(newData.getContactPerson());\\n528|        existingPoint.setPhoneNumber(newData.getPhoneNumber());\\n529|        existingPoint.setStatus(newData.getStatus());\\n530|        existingPoint.setUpdatedBy(newData.getUpdatedBy());\\n531|        existingPoint.setLastUpdated(new Date());\\n532|        \\n533|        // 5.     \\n534|        return pointRepository.save(existingPoint);\\n535|    }\\n536|}\\n537|```\\n538|\\n539|### 6.2     \\n540|\\n541|#### 6.2.1       \\n542|```java\\n543|/**\\n544| *       -         \\n545| */\\n546|@Component\\n547|public class DataValidator {\\n548|    \\n549|    private static final Pattern PHONE_PATTERN = \\n550|        Pattern.compile("^[+]?[0-9]{10,15}$");\\n551|    private static final Pattern BUSINESS_HOURS_PATTERN = \\n552|        Pattern.compile("^([0-1][0-9]|2[0-3]):[0-5][0-9]-([0-1][0-9]|2[0-3]):[0-5][0-9]$");\\n553|    \\n554|    /**\\n555|     *            \\n556|     */\\n557|    public ValidationResult validate(RestaurantPoint point) {\\n558|        ValidationResult result = new ValidationResult();\\n559|        \\n560|        //       \\n561|        validateRequiredField(point.getRestaurantName(), "    ", result);\\n562|        validateRequiredField(point.getAddress(), "  ", result);\\n563|        \\n564|        //         \\n565|        if (point.getPhoneNumber() != null && !point.getPhoneNumber().isEmpty()) {\\n566|            validatePhoneNumber(point.getPhoneNumber(), result);\\n567|        }\\n568|        \\n569|        //         \\n570|        if (point.getBusinessHours() != null && !point.getBusinessHours().isEmpty()) {\\n571|            validateBusinessHours(point.getBusinessHours(), result);\\n572|        }\\n573|        \\n574|        //       \\n575|        validateBusinessRules(point, result);\\n576|        \\n577|        return result;\\n578|    }\\n579|    \\n580|    private void validatePhoneNumber(String phone, ValidationResult result) {\\n581|        if (!PHONE_PATTERN.matcher(phone).matches()) {\\n582|            result.addError("phoneNumber", "         ");\\n583|        }\\n584|    }\\n585|}\\n586|```\\n587|\\n588|## 7. (Controller)\\n446|```java\\n447|@RestController\\n448|@RequestMapping("/api/restaurant-points")\\n449|public class RestaurantPointController {\\n450|    \\n451|    @Autowired\\n452|    private RestaurantPointService pointService;\\n453|    \\n454|    /**\\n455|     *        \\n456|     */\\n457|    @GetMapping("/{pointId}")\\n458|    public ResponseEntity<RestaurantPoint> getRestaurantPoint(\\n459|            @PathVariable String pointId) {\\n460|        RestaurantPoint point = pointService.getPointById(pointId);\\n461|        return ResponseEntity.ok(point);\\n462|    }\\n463|    \\n464|    /**\\n465|     *        \\n466|     */\\n467|    @PostMapping\\n468|    public ResponseEntity<RestaurantPoint> createRestaurantPoint(\\n469|            @Valid @RequestBody RestaurantPoint point,\\n470|            Principal principal) {\\n471|        point.setCreatedBy(principal.getName());\\n472|        RestaurantPoint created = pointService.createPoint(point);\\n473|        return ResponseEntity.status(HttpStatus.CREATED).body(created);\\n474|    }\\n475|    \\n476|    /**\\n477|     *        \\n478|     */\\n479|    @PutMapping("/{pointId}")\\n480|    public ResponseEntity<RestaurantPoint> updateRestaurantPoint(\\n481|            @PathVariable String pointId,\\n482|            @Valid @RequestBody RestaurantPoint point,\\n483|            Principal principal) {\\n484|        point.setUpdatedBy(principal.getName());\\n485|        RestaurantPoint updated = pointService.updatePoint(pointId, point);\\n486|        return ResponseEntity.ok(updated);\\n487|    }\\n488|}\\n489|```\\n490|\\n491|#### 6.1.2     (Service)\\n492|```java\\n493|@Service\\n494|transactional\\n495|public class RestaurantPointService {\\n496|    \\n497|    @Autowired\\n498|    private RestaurantPointRepository pointRepository;\\n499|    \\n500|    @Autowired\\n501|    private DataValidator dataValidator;\\n502|    \\n503|    @Autowired\\n504|    private OperationLogService logService;\\n505|    \\n506|    /**\\n507|     *         -             \\n508|     */\\n509|    public RestaurantPoint updatePoint(String pointId, RestaurantPoint newData) {\\n510|        // 1.       \\n511|        ValidationResult validation = dataValidator.validate(newData);\\n512|        if (!validation.isValid()) {\\n513|            throw new ValidationException("      ", validation.getErrors());\\n514|        }\\n515|        \\n516|        // 2.      \\n517|        RestaurantPoint existingPoint = pointRepository.findById(pointId)\\n518|            .orElseThrow(() -> new NotFoundException("      "));\\n519|        \\n520|        // 3.       \\n521|        logService.logUpdateOperation(existingPoint, newData);\\n522|        \\n523|        // 4.     \\n524|        existingPoint.setRestaurantName(newData.getRestaurantName());\\n525|        existingPoint.setAddress(newData.getAddress());\\n526|        existingPoint.setBusinessHours(newData.getBusinessHours());\\n527|        existingPoint.setContactPerson(newData.getContactPerson());\\n528|        existingPoint.setPhoneNumber(newData.getPhoneNumber());\\n529|        existingPoint.setStatus(newData.getStatus());\\n530|        existingPoint.setUpdatedBy(newData.getUpdatedBy());\\n531|        existingPoint.setLastUpdated(new Date());\\n532|        \\n533|        // 5.     \\n534|        return pointRepository.save(existingPoint);\\n535|    }\\n536|}\\n537|```\\n538|\\n539|### 6.2     \\n540|\\n541|#### 6.2.1       \\n542|```java\\n543|/**\\n544| *       -         \\n545| */\\n546|@Component\\n547|public class DataValidator {\\n548|    \\n549|    private static final Pattern PHONE_PATTERN = \\n550|        Pattern.compile("^[+]?[0-9]{10,15}$");\\n551|    private static final Pattern BUSINESS_HOURS_PATTERN = \\n552|        Pattern.compile("^([0-1][0-9]|2[0-3]):[0-5][0-9]-([0-1][0-9]|2[0-3]):[0-5][0-9]$");\\n553|    \\n554|    /**\\n555|     *            \\n556|     */\\n557|    public ValidationResult validate(RestaurantPoint point) {\\n558|        ValidationResult result = new ValidationResult();\\n559|        \\n560|        //       \\n561|        validateRequiredField(point.getRestaurantName(), "    ", result);\\n562|        validateRequiredField(point.getAddress(), "  ", result);\\n563|        \\n564|        //         \\n565|        if (point.getPhoneNumber() != null && !point.getPhoneNumber().isEmpty()) {\\n566|            validatePhoneNumber(point.getPhoneNumber(), result);\\n567|        }\\n568|        \\n569|        //         \\n570|        if (point.getBusinessHours() != null && !point.getBusinessHours().isEmpty()) {\\n571|            validateBusinessHours(point.getBusinessHours(), result);\\n572|        }\\n573|        \\n574|        //       \\n575|        validateBusinessRules(point, result);\\n576|        \\n577|        return result;\\n578|    }\\n579|    \\n580|    private void validatePhoneNumber(String phone, ValidationResult result) {\\n581|        if (!PHONE_PATTERN.matcher(phone).matches()) {\\n582|            result.addError("phoneNumber", "         ");\\n583|        }\\n584|    }\\n585|}\\n586|```\\n587|\\n588|## 7. )\\n260|```java\\n261|/**\\n262| *        -             \\n263| */\\n264|public class RestaurantPoint {\\n265|    private String pointId;          //    ID\\n266|    private String restaurantName; //     \\n271|    private Status status;           //   (  /  /  )\\n272|    private Date lastUpdated;        //       \\n273|    private String updatedBy;        //    \\n274|    \\n275|    //     \\n276|    public enum Status {\\n277|        ACTIVE,   //   \\n278|        MAINTENANCE,  //   \\n279|        CLOSED    //   \\n280|    }\\n281|}\\n282|```\\n283|\\n284|#### RefreshmentData (     )\\n285|```java\\n286|/**\\n287| *          -            \\n288| */\\n289|public class RefreshmentData {\\n290|    private String refreshmentId;    //    ID\\n291|    private String pointId;          //       ID\\n292|    private String dataType;         //     \\n293|    private Object dataValue;        //    \\n294|    private Date timestamp;          //    \\n295|    private boolean validated;       //      \\n296|}\\n297|```\\n298|\\n299|### 4.2      \\n300|\\n301|#### 4.2.1    \\n302|\\n303|**restaurant_points  **\\n304|```sql\\n305|CREATE TABLE restaurant_points (\\n306|    point_id VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,\\n307|    restaurant_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,\\n308|    address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,\\n309|    business_hours VARCHAR(50),\\n310|    contact_person VARCHAR(50),\\n311|    phone_number VARCHAR(20),\\n312|    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT \\\'ACTIVE\\\',\\n313|    last_updated TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,\\n314|    updated_by VARCHAR(50)\\n315|);\\n316|```\\n317|\\n318|**refreshment_data  **\\n319|```sql\\n320|CREATE TABLE refreshment_data (\\n321|    refreshment_id VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,\\n322|    point_id VARCHAR(50) REFERENCES restaurant_points(point_id),\\n323|    data_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,\\n324|    data_value TEXT,\\n325|    timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,\\n326|    validated BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,\\n327|    INDEX idx_point_id (point_id)\\n328|);\\n329|```\\n330|\\n331|**operation_logs  **\\n332|```sql\\n333|CREATE TABLE operation_logs (\\n334|    log_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,\\n335|    operation_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,\\n336|    point_id VARCHAR(50) REFERENCES restaurant_points(point_id),\\n337|    operator_id VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,\\n338|    operation_time TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,\\n339|    old_data JSON,\\n340|    new_data JSON,\\n341|    status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT \\\'SUCCESS\\\',\\n342|    error_message TEXT\\n343|);\\n344|```\\n345|\\n346|### 4.3       \\n347|\\n348|#### 4.3.1       \\n349|1. **    **:     ，  1-100  \\n350|2. **  **:     ，  1-255  \\n351|3. **    **:      "HH:MM-HH:MM"\\n352|4. **    **:       /        \\n353|5. **  **:          \\n354|\\n355|#### 4.3.2       \\n356|1.             \\n357|2.         24     \\n358|3.                "  "\\n359|4.                 \\n360|\\n361|## 5.     \\n362|\\n363|### 5.1     \\n364|\\n365|```\\n366|┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐\\n367|│                          (UI Layer)                      │\\n368|│  -                                                   │\\n369|│  -                                                   │\\n370|│  -                                                   │\\n371|│  -                                                   │\\n372|└──────────────────────┬──────────────────────────────────────┘\\n373|                       │\\n374|┌──────────────────────▼──────────────────────────────────────┐\\n375|│                      (Service Layer)                    │\\n376|│  -                 -                            │\\n377|│  -                 -                          │\\n378|│  -                 -                            │\\n379|└──────────────────────┬──────────────────────────────────────┘\\n380|                       │\\n381|┌──────────────────────▼──────────────────────────────────────┐\\n382|│                      (Data Access Layer)                │\\n383|│  - RestaurantPointDAO       - RefreshmentDataDAO            │\\n384|│  - OperationLogDAO          -                         │\\n385|└──────────────────────┬──────────────────────────────────────┘\\n386| 3.x\\n400|- **    **: Spring Security\\n401|- **    **: Spring Data JPA/Hibernate\\n402|- **    **: Hibernate Validator\\n403|- **API  **: RESTful API\\n404|- **    **: Maven \\n413|- **    **: PostgreSQL 14+   MySQL 8+\\n414|- **  **: Redis 7+\\n415|- **    **:           \\n416|\\n417|### 5.3     \\n418|\\n419|```\\n420|┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐\\n421|│                         (Nginx)                        │\\n422|│  -                      - SSL/TLS (Controller)\\n446|```java\\n447|@RestController\\n448|@RequestMapping("/api/restaurant-points")\\n449|public class RestaurantPointController {\\n450|    \\n451|    @Autowired\\n452|    private RestaurantPointService pointService;\\n453|    \\n454|    /**\\n455|     *        \\n456|     */\\n457|    @GetMapping("/{pointId}")\\n458|    public ResponseEntity<RestaurantPoint> getRestaurantPoint(\\n459|            @PathVariable String pointId) {\\n460|        RestaurantPoint point = pointService.getPointById(pointId);\\n461|        return ResponseEntity.ok(point);\\n462|    }\\n463|    \\n464|    /**\\n465|     *        \\n466|     */\\n467|    @PostMapping\\n468|    public ResponseEntity<RestaurantPoint> createRestaurantPoint(\\n469|            @Valid @RequestBody RestaurantPoint point,\\n470|            Principal principal) {\\n471|        point.setCreatedBy(principal.getName());\\n472|        RestaurantPoint created = pointService.createPoint(point);\\n473|        return ResponseEntity.status(HttpStatus.CREATED).body(created);\\n474|    }\\n475|    \\n476|    /**\\n477|     *        \\n478|     */\\n479|    @PutMapping("/{pointId}")\\n480|    public ResponseEntity<RestaurantPoint> updateRestaurantPoint(\\n481|            @PathVariable String pointId,\\n482|            @Valid @RequestBody RestaurantPoint point,\\n483|            Principal principal) {\\n484|        point.setUpdatedBy(principal.getName());\\n485|        RestaurantPoint updated = pointService.updatePoint(pointId, point);\\n486|        return ResponseEntity.ok(updated);\\n487|    }\\n488|}\\n489|```\\n490|\\n491|#### 6.1.2     (Service)\\n492|```java\\n493|@Service\\n494|transactional\\n495|public class RestaurantPointService {\\n496|    \\n497|    @Autowired\\n498|    private RestaurantPointRepository pointRepository;\\n499|    \\n500|    @Autowired\\n501|    private DataValidator dataValidator;\\n502|    \\n503|    @Autowired\\n504|    private OperationLogService logService;\\n505|    \\n506|    /**\\n507|     *         -             \\n508|     */\\n509|    public RestaurantPoint updatePoint(String pointId, RestaurantPoint newData) {\\n510|        // 1.       \\n511|        ValidationResult validation = dataValidator.validate(newData);\\n512|        if (!validation.isValid()) {\\n513|            throw new ValidationException("      ", validation.getErrors());\\n514|        }\\n515|        \\n516|        // 2.      \\n517|        RestaurantPoint existingPoint = pointRepository.findById(pointId)\\n518|            .orElseThrow(() -> new NotFoundException("      "));\\n519|        \\n520|        // 3.       \\n521|        logService.logUpdateOperation(existingPoint, newData);\\n522|        \\n523|        // 4.     \\n524|        existingPoint.setRestaurantName(newData.getRestaurantName());\\n525|        existingPoint.setAddress(newData.getAddress());\\n526|        existingPoint.setBusinessHours(newData.getBusinessHours());\\n527|        existingPoint.setContactPerson(newData.getContactPerson());\\n528|        existingPoint.setPhoneNumber(newData.getPhoneNumber());\\n529|        existingPoint.setStatus(newData.getStatus());\\n530|        existingPoint.setUpdatedBy(newData.getUpdatedBy());\\n531|        existingPoint.setLastUpdated(new Date());\\n532|        \\n533|        // 5.     \\n534|        return pointRepository.save(existingPoint);\\n535|    }\\n536|}\\n537|```\\n538|\\n539|### 6.2     \\n540|\\n541|#### 6.2.1       \\n542|```java\\n543|/**\\n544| *       -         \\n545| */\\n546|@Component\\n547|public class DataValidator {\\n548|    \\n549|    private static final Pattern PHONE_PATTERN = \\n550|        Pattern.compile("^[+]?[0-9]{10,15}$");\\n551|    private static final Pattern BUSINESS_HOURS_PATTERN = \\n552|        Pattern.compile("^([0-1][0-9]|2[0-3]):[0-5][0-9]-([0-1][0-9]|2[0-3]):[0-5][0-9]$");\\n553|    \\n554|    /**\\n555|     *            \\n556|     */\\n557|    public ValidationResult validate(RestaurantPoint point) {\\n558|        ValidationResult result = new ValidationResult();\\n559|        \\n560|        //       \\n561|        validateRequiredField(point.getRestaurantName(), "    ", result);\\n562|        validateRequiredField(point.getAddress(), "  ", result);\\n563|        \\n564|        //         \\n565|        if (point.getPhoneNumber() != null && !point.getPhoneNumber().isEmpty()) {\\n566|            validatePhoneNumber(point.getPhoneNumber(), result);\\n567|        }\\n568|        \\n569|        //         \\n570|        if (point.getBusinessHours() != null && !point.getBusinessHours().isEmpty()) {\\n571|            validateBusinessHours(point.getBusinessHours(), result);\\n572|        }\\n573|        \\n574|        //       \\n575|        validateBusinessRules(point, result);\\n576|        \\n577|        return result;\\n578|    }\\n579|    \\n580|    private void validatePhoneNumber(String phone, ValidationResult result) {\\n581|        if (!PHONE_PATTERN.matcher(phone).matches()) {\\n582|            result.addError("phoneNumber", "         ");\\n583|        }\\n584|    }\\n585|}\\n586|```\\n587|\\n588|## 7. \\n- **swagger-config.yml**: API    \\n\\n## 3.        \\n\\n### 3.1       \\n\\n```mermaid\\nclassDiagram\\n    class User {\\n        +String userId\\n        +String username\\n        +String password\\n        +String email\\n        +String role\\n        +Date createdAt\\n        +Date lastLoginAt\\n        +boolean isActive\\n        +authenticate(password: String) boolean\\n        +hasRole(role: String) boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    class RestaurantPoint {\\n        +String pointId\\n        +String restaurantName\\n        +String address\\n        +String businessHours\\n        +String contactPerson\\n        +String phoneNumber\\n        +PointStatus status\\n        +Date lastUpdated\\n        +String updatedBy\\n        +int version\\n        +validate() ValidationResult\\n        +getFormattedBusinessHours() String\\n    }\\n    \\n    class RefreshmentData {\\n        +String refreshmentId\\n        +String pointId\\n        +String dataType\\n        +Object dataValue\\n        +Date timestamp\\n        +boolean validated\\n        +String validationNotes\\n        +isValidated() boolean\\n        +setValidationStatus(validated: boolean, notes: String)\\n    }\\n    \\n    class OperationLog {\\n        +Long logId\\n        +String operationType\\n        +String pointId\\n        +String operatorId\\n        +Date operationTime\\n        +String oldData\\n        +String newData\\n        +String status\\n        +String errorMessage\\n        +logOperation(operationType: String, pointId: String, operatorId: String)\\n        +setResult(status: String, errorMessage: String)\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ValidationResult {\\n        +boolean isValid\\n        +List~ValidationError~ errors\\n        +Date validationTime\\n        +String validatorName\\n        +addError(field: String, message: String)\\n        +hasErrors() boolean\\n        +getErrorMessages() List~String~\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ValidationError {\\n        +String field\\n        +String message\\n        +String errorCode\\n        +Object rejectedValue\\n        +getFormattedMessage() String\\n    }\\n    \\n    class PointStatus {\\n        <<enumeration>>\\n        ACTIVE\\n        MAINTENANCE\\n        CLOSED\\n    }\\n    \\n    class OperationType {\\n        <<enumeration>>\\n        CREATE\\n        UPDATE\\n        DELETE\\n        VALIDATE\\n        CANCEL\\n    }\\n    \\n    %%     \\n    User \\"1\\" --> \\"*\\" OperationLog :   \\n    RestaurantPoint \\"1\\" --> \\"*\\" RefreshmentData :   \\n    RestaurantPoint \\"1\\" --> \\"*\\" OperationLog :   \\n    ValidationResult \\"1\\" --> \\"*\\" ValidationError :   \\n    RestaurantPoint ..> ValidationResult :   \\n    RestaurantPoint ..> PointStatus :   \\n    OperationLog ..> OperationType :   \\n```\\n\\n### 3.2     \\n\\n```mermaid\\nclassDiagram\\n    class RestaurantPointService {\\n        <<interface>>\\n        +getPointById(pointId: String) RestaurantPointDTO\\n        +searchPoints(criteria: SearchCriteria) Page~RestaurantPointDTO~\\n        +createPoint(point: CreatePointRequest) RestaurantPointDTO\\n        +updatePoint(pointId: String, updateData: UpdatePointRequest) RestaurantPointDTO\\n        +deletePoint(pointId: String) boolean\\n        +validatePoint(pointId: String) ValidationResultDTO\\n        +confirmUpdate(pointId: String, confirmation: ConfirmationRequest) boolean\\n        +cancelOperation(pointId: String) boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ValidationService {\\n        <<interface>>\\n        +validateRestaurantPoint(point: RestaurantPointDTO) ValidationResultDTO\\n        +validateBusinessHours(hours: String) boolean\\n        +validatePhoneNumber(phone: String) boolean\\n        +validateAddress(address: String) boolean\\n        +validateRequiredFields(data: Map~String, Object~) List~String~\\n    }\\n    \\n    class AuthService {\\n        <<interface>>\\n        +authenticate(username: String, password: String) AuthResponse\\n        +refreshToken(refreshToken: String) AuthResponse\\n        +logout(token: String) boolean\\n        +validateToken(token: String) UserDetails\\n        +getCurrentUser() UserDTO\\n    }\\n    \\n    class OperationLogService {\\n        <<interface>>\\n        +logOperation(operation: OperationLogDTO) OperationLogDTO\\n        +getLogsByPointId(pointId: String) List~OperationLogDTO~\\n        +getLogsByOperatorId(operatorId: String) List~OperationLogDTO~\\n        +searchLogs(criteria: LogSearchCriteria) Page~OperationLogDTO~\\n        +exportLogs(criteria: ExportCriteria) byte[]\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ETOURIntegrationService {\\n        <<interface>>\\n        +syncPointData(pointId: String) boolean\\n        +checkConnection() boolean\\n        +handleConnectionError(error: Exception) boolean\\n        +getPointFromETOUR(pointId: String) ETOURPointDTO\\n        +updatePointInETOUR(pointId: String, data: Map~String, Object~) boolean\\n    }\\n    \\n    %%     \\n    class RestaurantPointServiceImpl {\\n        +getPointById(pointId: String) RestaurantPointDTO\\n        +updatePoint(pointId: String, updateData: UpdatePointRequest) RestaurantPointDTO\\n        -validateUpdateRequest(request: UpdatePointRequest) ValidationResultDTO\\n        -checkConcurrentUpdate(pointId: String, version: int) boolean\\n        -saveWithRetry(point: RestaurantPoint, maxRetries: int) RestaurantPoint\\n    }\\n    \\n    class ValidationServiceImpl {\\n You may choose to execute any of these steps. When publishing message to Product Manager, you should directly copy the full original user requirement.\n2.1. If the requirement contains both DATA-RELATED part mentioned in 1 and software development part mentioned in 2, you should decompose the software development part and assign them to different team members based on their expertise, and assign the DATA-RELATED part to Data Analyst David directly.\n2.2. For software development requirement, estimate the complexity of the requirement before assignment, following the common industry practice of t-shirt sizing:\n - XS: snake game, static personal homepage, basic calculator app\n - S: Basic photo gallery, basic file upload system, basic feedback form\n - M: Offline menu ordering system, news aggregator app\n - L: Online booking system, inventory management system\n - XL: Social media platform, e-commerce app, real-time multiplayer game\n - For XS and S requirements, you don\'t need the standard software development process, you may directly ask Engineer to write the code.
